title: Mathematical Thinking Enhancement Program Through Simulation/VR-Based Coding Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and mathematical problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Job-integrated education for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Improvement in algorithm design skills to solve given mathematical problems in a VR simulation environment
Enhancement of critical thinking and reasoning abilities in mathematical problem-solving processes through coding practice

Learners will apply Agile methodology in a 4-member team project, complete five user stories per sprint over three 2-week sprints, and achieve ≥4/5 in four of five team collaboration evaluation items to establish and execute collaborative problem-solving strategies.

Learners will generate ≥3 visualization charts (bar, line, scatter) from a provided dataset using digital tools (Tableau or Power BI), analyze simulation results with ≥5 quantitative metrics (mean, variance, trends), and submit a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
